revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_PodPain}} '''A_PodPain''' [(string ''gootype'')]
(no parameter)
Spawns an actor of type ''gootype'' (by default, {{Class|PodGoo}}) 50% of the time, with 6.25% chance of spawning a second actor of the same type as well. The spawned goos, if any, are given velocities between -2 and +2 on the X and Y axes, and between 0.5 and 2.5 on the Z axis. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Pod}} and derived classes. == Examples == Taked from [[Classes:Pod|pod]] pain state: Pain: PPOD B 14 A_PodPain Goto Spawn [[Category:Decorate Heretic functions]] [[Category:Decorate Spawn functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:PodPain}}
